tweets.text: I am hearing that @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @NESouthWest may have finally seen sense!? @ChrisGPackham @Natures_Voice @DevonWildlife https://t.co/fAB6uuBlCW

@Independent We all told the EA it had changed back in Sept & it was off the scale in our homes & gardens, they said it was fine using old monitoring data, then came the nighttime wall of gas that chocked us in our homes with WHO breaking hydrogen sulphide, PHE were just as bad not listening! https://t.co/Sd70Nx7DE0

tweets.text: @ShaunLintern @EnvAgency Have a look at #Mullaghglass landfill site in Belfast/Lisburn in NI. Same thing is going on, residents also campaigning for #CleanAir Landfill sites are a national scandal!

Thank you for capturing the seriousness of this urgent public health and environmental threat, @ShaunLintern. Living near Walley's Quarry has become unbearable but many of us are trapped and unable to escape. H2S is in my house as I'm typing this tweet.

https://t.co/UWBRK9io5q
@a_merrydew @EnvAgencyMids Your right it has got worse, and tonight is going to be another sleepless night.

UPDATE - After the appeal we put out last night to @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup & @NESouthWest there was no nest destruction today at the River Otter Restoration Project in Devon and the partners are reconsidering their plans - thank you . Top work @WiseBirding et al . https://t.co/A8KSk5gcuE

@ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Great news Chris - thank you as always. Shame #HS2 didn‚Äôt show some reason & compromise before destroying this mass of bramble on Wormwood Scrubs a few weeks back. Heartbreaking. But sadly we know only too well that reason & compromise is not their style..... https://t.co/cXkNykFCXz

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

tweets.text: @EnvAgencyMids Judging from the odour in Hartshill (over 2 miles) away, Friday night, last night and all day today they have failed. Our children's school and our home has been full of the stench. #notgoodenough @envAgencyMids #stopthestink
@EnvAgencyMids Jesus, you lot must be on some serious backhanders.

@EnvAgencyMids Meanwhile tonight excited children in Newcastle under Lyme are suffering. üëá why don‚Äôt you just stop @RedIndustries2 accepting the waste until you find out what exactly is going on! #stopthestink https://t.co/ifi4BkZRJA

@davemh72 @DrMickSalt @Samanth33412592 @StinkStopthe @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @DefraGovUK @Cap_it_off @SimonTagg @AaronBell4NUL @JournoJess_  @ShaunLintern  breach after breach after breach. @EnvAgency  @EnvAgencyMids  @ClareDinnisEA  do you need some help writing up your next report?

Nothing to see here eh @EnvAgencyMids & @RedIndustries2? Just a damning letter describing how the toxic gases from Walley‚Äôs Quarry affect Staffordshire‚Äôs Fire and Rescue Service. I‚Äôd put that on the top of any risk registers you have (if you have any of course). #stopthestink https://t.co/avCr11feZn

@ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Thanks for the RT Chris.The ‚Äòecologist‚Äô only stepped forward when she saw me start to film. She‚Äôd stood back with no regard for the creatures & their homes that were being destroyed. It still distresses me to watch it back now.

@EnvAgencyMids The odour has gotten worse since the capping took place. I didn't think it was possible for it to get worse but sadly I was wrong. I'm breathing in H2S while typing this tweet, as the noxious gas has pervaded my home again. More sleep deprivation & stress for many in NUL tonight.

@SianieRoo @ClareDinnisEA @Cap_it_off @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice Yes I agree. I will fight for fresh air for my Son until this landfill is shut down! Can I ask you this? @BorisJohnson @matthancock @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA Would you fight for oxygen for your child? I‚Äôll fight until the day I die for what is right. Tell me I‚Äôm wrong?? üå≤ üåç

tweets.text: To ensure future allocation of #water resources is safeguarded & optimised @EnvAgency is renovating Great Ouse #Groundwater Scheme, which pumps water to local rivers & to Essex during dry summers as part of Ely Ouse to Essex Transfer Scheme https://t.co/F7KhdyXJQf

Please listen now @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @NESouthWest @kiergroup This COULD be a fantastic project but you need to do the work at the correct time of year and NOT during the breeding season. Thanks @ChrisGPackham for the support and fingers crossed they see sense. https://t.co/En5Y1I6Rts

entity.name: Good Morning Britain
entity.description: Good morning, Britain. Up early and need to catch up on the latest news, weather and sports? Then this weekday morning programme is for you, offering the latest information in such areas as entertainment, health and money. `Good Morning Britain' is the typical morning news and talk show. It features a number of presenters, correspondents and reporters covering what you should know to start your day before heading out the door.
